snippet: Research building on data from the Women’s Health Initiative confirms that the risks of hormones outweigh the benefits, but that their use is sometimes appropriate.
abstract: Research building on data from Women’s Health Initiative confirms that risks of hormone therapy for menopause outweigh benefits, but that their use is still sometimes appropriate; latest findings appear in The Journal of the American Medical Assn.
lead_paragraph: Research building on data from the Women’s Health Initiative confirms that the risks of hormones outweigh the benefits, but that their use is sometimes appropriate.

headline.main: Study of Hormone Use in Menopause Reaffirms Complex Mix of Risks and Benefits
headline.print_headline: Study of Hormone Use in Menopause Reaffirms Complex Mix of Risks and Benefits

keywords.value: Journal of the American Medical Assn
keywords.name: organizations
